document.full_text: a 24-country poll found that most people believe wikileaks co-founder julian assange is not a criminal and should not be charged by the u.s. government for releasing thousands of secret u.s. documents.
document.title: wikileaks' julian assange is not a criminal: global poll
lines_and_colors: a 24-country poll found that most people believe wikileaks co-founder julian assange is not a criminal and should not be charged by the u.s. government for releasing thousands of secret u.s. documents.
